entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
